It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"submitProposal(string,uint256,uint256,address)":{"details":"Allows users to submit a proposal","params":{"_maximumAmount":"The maximum amount of fundingToken requested","_metadata":"The metadata of the proposal","_minimumAmount":"The minimum amount of fundingToken requested","_recipient":"The address that will receive the fundingToken if the proposal is accepted"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). the calculated withdrawable amount is zeroFundingVault__TransferFailed if the token transfer fails","details":"This function can only be called after the tally date has passed and funds have been distributedThe function calculates the user's share based on their initial deposit and the remaining fundsState changes are made before the transfer to prevent reentrancyEmits a RemainingFundsWithdrawn event upon successful withdrawalThis function does not take any parameters as it uses msg.sender to identify the user"}},"stateVariables":{"i_tallyDate":{"details":"The date in remaining funds after distribution"}},"notice":"A contract that allows users to deposit funds and vote on proposals, after voting ends anyone can call distributeFunds to distribute the funds to the proposals Whether a proposal is selected for receiving funds is decided using this formula: Let: `V(p)` be the number of votingPowerTokens assigned to proposal `p` `S` be the total supply of votingPowerTokens `R` be the vault's balance of fundingTokens A proposal `p` is accepted iff `R * V(p)/S >= p.minimumAmount`. The funding to be received by an accepted proposal `p` is `min(p.maximumAmount, R * V(p)/S)`. The funding to be received by a rejected proposal `p` is `0`.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/FundingVault.sol":"FundingVault"},"evmVersion":"paris","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":ds-test/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/forge-std/lib/ds-test/src/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"]},"sources":{"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/access/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0xff6d0bb2e285473e5311d9d3caacb525ae3538a80758c10649a4d61029b017bb","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://8ed324d3920bb545059d66ab97d43e43ee85fd3bd52e03e401f020afb0b120f6","dweb:/ipfs/QmfEckWLmZkDDcoWrkEvMWhms66xwTLff9DDhegYpvHo1a"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/interfaces/draft-IERC6093.sol":{"keccak256":"0x60c65f701957fdd6faea1acb0bb45825791d473693ed9ecb34726fdfaa849dd7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://ea290300e0efc4d901244949dc4d877fd46e6c5e43dc2b26620e8efab3ab803f","dweb:/ipfs/QmcLLJppxKeJWqHxE2CUkcfhuRTgHSn8J4kijcLa5MYhSt"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/ERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc3e1fa9d1987f8d349dfb4d6fe93bf2ca014b52ba335cfac30bfe71e357e6f80","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://c5703ccdeb7b1d685e375ed719117e9edf2ab4bc544f24f23b0d50ec82257229","dweb:/ipfs/QmTdwkbQq7owpCiyuzE7eh5LrD2ddrBCZ5WHVsWPi1RrTS"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/IERC20.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc6a8ff0ea489379b61faa647490411b80102578440ab9d84e9a957cc12164e70","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0ea104e577e63faea3b69c415637e99e755dcbf64c5833d7140c35a714d6d90c","dweb:/ipfs/Qmau6x4Ns9XdyynRCNNp3RhLqijJjFm7z5fyZazfYFGYdq"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/IERC20Metadata.sol":{"keccak256":"0xaa761817f6cd7892fcf158b3c776b34551cde36f48ff9703d53898bc45a94ea2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://0ad7c8d4d08938c8dfc43d75a148863fb324b80cf53e0a36f7e5a4ac29008850","dweb:/ipfs/QmcrhfPgVNf5mkdhQvy1pMv51TFokD3Y4Wa5WZhFqVh8UV"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/Context.sol":{"keccak256":"0x493033a8d1b176a037b2cc6a04dad01a5c157722049bbecf632ca876224dd4b2","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://6a708e8a5bdb1011c2c381c9a5cfd8a9a956d7d0a9dc1bd8bcdaf52f76ef2f12","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]},"lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/utils/ReentrancyGuard.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf980daa263b661ab8ddee7d4fd833c7da7e7995e2c359ff1f17e67e4112f2236","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://7448ab095d6940130bcf76ba47a2eab14148c83119523b93dd89f6d84edd6c02","dweb:/ipfs/QmawrZ4voKQjH3oomXT3Kuheb3Mnmo2VvVpxg8Ne5UJUrd"]},"src/FundingVault.sol":{"keccak256":"0x2d1248b78ecdae2d5d3748debd4494f33be4a7f968efb185f2b99e0e53fa4047","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://791c7caf59aeea4405c1219b68a9f9ce7aa9f1ee3d05abe91569fb4e90968388","dweb:/ipfs/QmYj8R2ybeAoNZkSqUPUBDyz7xAeFNcx1nFU7hAqYGoJmk"]},"src/VotingPowerToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x759b62ddea16c03bc667f765fe1f339c3bc01f9139c3c60d7184bc761d4794f0","license":"UNLICENSED","urls":["bzz-raw://a20ad65d7e185eeb3a1b0ff7d080e874674d828e759d3200a5aea1388364c4ec","dweb:/ipfs/QmZwoUSpR7RazimRGpGkCyPVSyWHY7nfzM7dhFon8GTzk5"]}},"version":1}

calculateFundingToBeReceived(uint256).details: Calculates the amount of fundingToken to be received by a proposal

params._proposalId: The id of the proposal to calculate the funding for

returns._0: The amount of fundingToken to be received by the proposal

params._fundingToken: The token that will be used to fund the proposals
params._maxRequestableAmount: The maximum amount of token that can be requested in proposal
params._minRequestableAmount: The minimum amount of token that can be requested in proposal
params._tallyDate: The date in which the tally will be taken as seconds since unix epoch
params._votingPowerToken: The token that will be minted when a user locks their voting tokens
params._votingToken: The token that will be locked against voting power tokens, which allows the user to vote on proposals

deposit(uint256).details: Allows users to deposit fundingToken into the vault

params._amount: The amount of fundingToken to deposit

distributeFunds().details: Distributes the funds to the proposals

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

register(uint256).details: locks votingToken from the user and mints votingPowerToken

params._amount: The amount of votingTokens to lock in order to receive votingPowerTokens

releaseVotingTokens().details: Allows users to release their votingToken after the tally date has passed

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

submitProposal(string,uint256,uint256,ad.details: Allows users to submit a proposal

params._maximumAmount: The maximum amount of fundingToken requested
params._minimumAmount: The minimum amount of fundingToken requested
params._recipient: The address that will receive the fundingToken if the proposal is accepted

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

voteOnProposal(uint256,uint256).details: Allows users to vote on a proposal

params._amount: The amount of votingToken to vote with
params._proposalId: The id of the proposal to vote on

withdrawRemaining().custom:throws: FundingVault__FundsNotDistributedYet if funds haven't been distributed yetFundingVault__NoFundsToWithdraw if the user has no funds to withdrawFundingVault__NoRemainingFundsToWithdraw if there are no remaining funds to withdrawFundingVault__WithdrawableAmountTooSmall if the calculated withdrawable amount is zeroFundingVault__TransferFailed if the token transfer fails
withdrawRemaining().details: This function can only be called after the tally date has passed and funds have been distributedThe function calculates the user's share based on their initial deposit and the remaining fundsState changes are made before the transfer to prevent reentrancyEmits a RemainingFundsWithdrawn event upon successful withdrawalThis function does not take any parameters as it uses msg.sender to identify the user

distributeFunds().notice: Can only be called after the tally date has passed

releaseVotingTokens().notice: Can only be called after the tally date has passed

withdrawRemaining().notice: Allows users to withdraw their proportional share of remaining funds after distribution
